section.title: Material Usage Variance by Warehouse
section.para: To view material usage variances by Item, select the "Material Usage Variance by Item" option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing material usage variances by Warehouse, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display material usage variances for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose material usage variances you want to display.
Material usage variances generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Material usage variances generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists material usage variances by Warehouse, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
